  • Method Details

    • getAllRestaurants

      List<RestaurantDto> getAllRestaurants()
      Get the list of all the restaurants.
      Returns:
      a list of all existing restaurants.

    • getRestaurantOfAdmin

      RestaurantDto getRestaurantOfAdmin(User admin) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get the restaurant of a given user.
      Parameters:
      admin - the owner of a restaurant
      Returns:
      the restaurant belonging to the given admin
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the admin has no restaurant

    • getRestaurantByName

      RestaurantDto getRestaurantByName(String name) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get a restaurant by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the restaurant
      Returns:
      the restaurant with the given name
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no restaurant exists with the given name

    • getRestaurantsByDeliveryZone

      List<RestaurantDto> getRestaurantsByDeliveryZone(String deliveryZoneName)
      Get the list of restaurants by delivery zone.
      Parameters:
      deliveryZoneName - the name of the delivery zone to be searched after
      Returns:
      the list of restaurants which deliver to the given delivery zone

    • addRestaurant

      void addRestaurant(RestaurantDto restaurantDto) throws InvalidDataException, DuplicateDataException, InvalidOperationException
      Add a new restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurantDto - the data of the restaurant to be added
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - if the data related to the restaurant is invalid
      DuplicateDataException - if the name of the restaurant is already taken
      InvalidOperationException - if the admin already has a restaurant

    • exportMenu

      void exportMenu(String restaurantName) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Export the menu of the restaurant in PDF format.
      Parameters:
      restaurantName - the name of the restaurant
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no restaurant with the given name was found
